title: Protection from Energy
content:
rison table

Protection from Energy has up to 5 different variants to choose from. This allows players to have more tools at their disposal when casting this Spell on any type of creature.

NAME INFO EFFECT Protection from Energy: Thunder Until Long RestMeleeConcentration Grant the target Resistance to Thunder damage. Protection from Energy:Lightning Until Long RestMeleeConcentration Grant the target Resistance to Lightning damage. Protection from Energy:Fire Until Long RestMeleeConcentration Gr
